com.thegongoliers.output.interfaces

Interface DriveTrainInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Stoppable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MecanumDriveTrainInterface, SmartDrivetrain
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SmartDriveTrainSubsystem

    public interface DriveTrainInterface
extends Stoppable

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • forward

        void forward(double speed)
        Drive forward at the given speed
        Parameters:
        speed - The speed of the robot from 0 to 1 inclusive.

      • backward

        void backward(double speed)
        Drive in reverse at the given speed
        Parameters:
        speed - The speed of the robot from 0 to 1 inclusive.

      • rotateLeft

        void rotateLeft(double speed)
        Rotate left at the given speed
        Parameters:
        speed - The speed of rotation from 0 to 1 inclusive.

      • rotateRight

        void rotateRight(double speed)
        Rotate right at the given speed
        Parameters:
        speed - The speed of rotation from 0 to 1 inclusive.

      • arcade

        void arcade(double speed,
            double rotation)
        Operate the robot with an arcade control.
        Parameters:
        speed - The speed to drive at from -1 to 1 inclusive. Negative speed is forward.
        rotation - The rotation to drive at from -1 to 1 inclusive. Negative rotation is left.

      • tank

        void tank(double left,
          double right)
        Operate the robot with a tank control.
        Parameters:
        left - The speed to drive the left train at.
        right - The speed to drive the right train at.
